title: PBE Download incredibly slow
body:
Hi,ive been trying to download it but it did 2 days to go to 80% and it tolled me that i dont have much space.I tried it so many  times it takes too long to install.Is there a way that it can get faster??? Thank you :)



Regards{{champion:64}} {{item:3071}} {{champion:64}} {{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body: Definitely make sure you have enough space in the directory you're saving to!  If the update continues to struggle then your network might be having issues grabbing those files.  The steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide should help with that!

It's not connection though. People have internet that downloads at the speed of light but the PBE server seems to download incredibly slow for everyone around the world. Why does it do that though? It happened roughly 7 months ago and is happening again now with all the new PBE downloads. Plz Fix Rito :/
{{item:3070}}

You could have download speeds of galactic proportions, but you can still run into snags reaching specific services like the patching server.  We can't know your specific case for sure until possibilities and most common issues are resolved.
This is a league of legends problem, not a client based problem, instead of responding with that try to fix the problem that literally everyone has while trying to download PBE.

12/1/17 problem still persists! It's not my download speed and not disk space. This is a LOL issue. You need to focus on fixing the issue instead of attacking people reporting the problem. Riot needs to review your performance.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nv1TEsuR,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2017-10-20T15:22:50.907+0000)
>
> You could have download speeds of galactic proportions, but you can still run into snags reaching specific services like the patching server.  We can't know your specific case for sure until possibilities and most common issues are resolved.

As you can see all of us may not be having issues on our side. I am in PBE for nearly two years. Always slow download. The problem on your side, fix it.

This is kind of absurd, clearly this is a common place issue and not a single solution has been found nor has anyone with Riot even attempted to communicate about the problem. The problem lies on your side, there's no debating that, at least be up front and say you don't know the issue, or better yet try and actually pass the message to the ones maintaining the server in an attempt to resolve the issue.

Edit: More importantly the fact that this issue has existed for years now looking through the forums, it's just negligence.
